Summary: bright white, approx 3 x larger than a 747 plane, totally motionless,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carrum Downs
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy partner & i were up all night and i went outside 4 a smoke , the time was approx, 3am, not a cloud in the sky and there it hovered ,it was as bright as the moon at least 3 times bigger than any plane. we thought at first that it could be a blimp or balloon but after 45 minutes of not a hint of movement. we still dont know what it was , oh i did tape it on video but i forgot to change the tape and months later i went over it. if anyone knows how to retrieve it i would appreciate it greatly.after hours of going back outside & it hadnt moved i just had enough of not understanding what it was so i never went out again.
